productDescription: T-shirt from the ARISE collection. The tee features the lunar cycle, the phases of the moon, on the right chest. The shirt is made of 100% high quality cotton and is slightly fitted. The item has a seamless 2.2 cm ribbed collar.

optionalInfo.fit:
Romy is 167 cm tall
Romy is wearing a size S
Length: 68 cm
Chest width: 43 cm

This item runs true to size
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We’ve been on the moon, anything is possible. We have beautiful qualities that make the impossible possible. Our intellectual side, our loving side, they both create incredible developments. At the same time it’s essential to always reflect of what we do, like the moon reflects the sunlight. We have to keep searching for that next step, cause a small step can turn into a giant leap.
